sentences.en: A defect of vision prevented him from focusing accurately.
sentences.cn: 视力上的缺陷使他不能准确对焦.

sentences.en: A report has pointed out the defects of the present system.
sentences.cn: 一份报告指出了现有体制的缺陷。

sentences.en: All the cars are tested for defects before they leave the factory.
sentences.cn: 所有汽车在出厂前都经过品质检验。

sentences.en: For a child to be born with this disability indicates a defect in obstetric care.
sentences.cn: 孩子出生时就带有这样的残疾，这表明产科护理有问题。

sentences.en: He has a congenital heart defect.
He was born with a hearing defect.
sentences.cn: 他患有先天性听力缺损。

sentences.en: His defect caused arrears of work to build up in the court.
sentences.cn: 他的缺点使法院的工作积压起来.

sentences.en: I don't think the importance of this defect should be exaggerated.
sentences.cn: 我认为这一缺点的重要性不应加以夸大.

sentences.en: One type is the Schottky defect in ionic crystals.
sentences.cn: 在离子晶体中有一类是斯考特库缺陷.

sentences.en: Stammering is probably an inherited defect.
sentences.cn: 口吃很可能是一种遗传性缺陷。

sentences.en: The defect in the drainage must be remedied.
sentences.cn: 这排水系统的缺陷该设法补救.

sentences.en: The defect of these cloths is clash of colors.
sentences.cn: 这几种布的缺点是颜色不调和.

sentences.en: The gut will pass through the defect into the chest.
sentences.cn: 肠管可经过缺损进入胸腔.

sentences.en: The major defect of their work was deference to authority.
sentences.cn: 他们的主要缺陷是趋从权威.

sentences.en: The place had also a more abiding defect.
sentences.cn: 这块地方还有一种更是由来已久的不良之风.

sentences.en: This condition creates an inherent defect in the battery.
sentences.cn: 这种情况会使电池产生一种内在的故障.

words.tran_cn: 有缺陷的人；不完全变化词

phrases.tran_cn: 心房中隔缺损；心房间隔缺损

trans.tran_en: a fault or a lack of something that means that something or someone is not perfect
to leave your own country or group in order to go to or join an opposing one
to leave your own country or group in order to go to or join an opposing one
